title: The Love Kitchen at Absolute Sanctuary
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. NOTE: Previously listed as vegan, but as Aug 2010, reported to HappyCow to also serve meat and dairy.  Part of Absolute Yoga. All natural kitchen offering extensive vegetarian menu, fresh baked breads, cookies, sandwiches, raw options, raw ice cream, salads, healthy elixirs, juices, and more. Internet access available. Yoga studio and western bodywork available.
streetAddress: 88 Moo 5 Bophut, Tambon Choeng Mon Beach
